actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.
Reported to House from the Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce with amendment, H. Rept. 96-1453.
Measure laid on table in House (See S. 1828 for similar provisions).

official_title: A bill to exempt the Milner Dam from certain requirements of the Federal Power Act (16 U.S.C. 807), and for other purposes.

summary.text: Deems the proposed Milner Dam project, Idaho, to consist only of: (1) water regulation and conveyance facilities; and (2) powerplants and power transmission facilities to be hereafter constructed. States that only the proposed power facilities shall be subject to Federal takeover pursuant to the Federal Power Act.

titles.title: A bill to exempt the Milner Dam from certain requirements of the Federal Power Act (16 U.S.C. 807), and for other purposes.
